title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 80-4.3 - Small carpets and rugs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 80-4.3 - Small carpets and rugs

State Regulations

Any small carpet or rug shall be deemed highly flammable
and dangerous if it fails to meet the standard contained in Appendix F-4 of
this Part (Standard for the Surface Flammability of Small Carpets and Rugs
[Pill Test], DOC FF 2-70, issued by the U. S. Secretary of

Commerce.)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
80-4.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
